snippet: Some are discovering that another country can offer a vibrant retirement lifestyle.
abstract: Many Americans are discovering that retirement in another country is an option that offers a vibrant lifestyle, and find that they can stretch their dollars farther and enjoy a more comfortable standard of living; current generation of retirees is embracing the idea of living abroad at a much greater rate than those in the past.
lead_paragraph: Some are discovering that another country can offer a vibrant retirement lifestyle.

headline.seo: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons
headline.main: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons
headline.print_headline: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons
